conbody.p: You might encounter situations when your session has been terminated due to a specific reason related to the license mechanism. This section explains some common causes of your session termination.

p.b: Inactive session; the license has been transferred to <another_user>.

ul.li: When your session is inactive, another licensed user from your Organization can occupy your license.

b.b: Your account has logged in on another machine.

ul.li: One Katalon account can be active on one machine at a time.

p.b: This machine has been removed from the registered list.

ul.li: This happens when your Organization Admins or Owner remove your machine from the registered list on Katalon TestOps. This removal ends your session on the Katalon Studio app.

p.b: This email has been removed from the registered list.

ul.li: This happens when your Organization Admins or Owner remove your email from the registered list on Katalon TestOps. This removal ends your session on the Katalon Studio app.

conbody.p: This session has been terminated. or This session has been terminated: Invalid credentials.

ul.li: This happens when the connection to the licensing server fails. This failure is because your machine goes to sleep or the network is off.
